entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Detect Many to Many Relation Not Configured as Such #32677
  • Generating migrations for `DbContext`based on schema #32675

Closed

Trusted Norton has given this file a trusted rating. ____________________________ https://downloadmirror.intel.com/812114/gfx_win_101.5084_101.5122.exe Downloaded File from intel.com gfx_win_101.5084_101.5122.exe ____________________________ File Thumbprint - SHA: 414390b649d9def62e5f7c6ddeb2c7ad3b504171b1d7133d812d6578668120be File Thumbprint - MD5: bcbc7015ac74cf9de5dff0a9cc54e803 #32676
  • Linq to sql:The timeout occurred because the timestamp function was used when querying a time field, which caused the timeout #32671
  • DeleteBehavior.Restrict results in "The association between entity types 'Root' and 'Child' has been severed, but the relationship is either marked as required or is implicitly required because the foreign key is not nullable" #32666
